lyrics:
9 contributorsfriends lyricsverse 1
all my life ive been searching for something
something i cant put my finger on
maybe ive been living for the weekend
maybe ive been living for this cyber soul
but every friday just about midnight
all my problems seem to disappear
everyone that i miss when im distant
everybodys here

chorus
i need love cause only love is true
i need every wakin hour with you
and my friends cause theyre so beautiful
yeah my friends they are so beautiful
theyre my friends

verse 2
all my life ive been wastin wastin
wastin all my money all my time
all the time that im waitin waitin
waitin for the moment you are mine
theres somethin about you that im thinkin thinkin
thinkin all the things that ive done wrong
but all the time yeah i was forgettin
you were mine all along

yeah my friends they are so beautiful

outro
